artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded black and white music sheet with the score on the recto and verso; from fashion periodical (P.15,461) that includes a folded hand-colored engraving of a man and a woman in fashionable period dress (P.15,459-P.15,460)
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Musical score ('Air De Demophon' by Johann Christoph Vogel) from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Troisième Cahier, 15 Mars 1790
